reviews.review_msg: I can certainly say that he is (one of) the most dedicated professor teacher(s) at SFU, even in whole Canada/world. He is amazingly organized and well-prepared for his classes; and also his profound knowledge rocks his classes.

By the end of that term, our course ended up to have only 4 people registered; and professor gave 4 different grades to us; it was like ranking the students. I don't know if there were such huge differences to reflect this harsh ranking.
He is absolutely very knowledgeable and cares a lot about the students. On the other hand, the way he presents the lectures is kind of messy and not very decent.
He is the best prof I had in SFU. He is clever, kind and modest. He is interested in the course material and welcomes you to talk to him at any time.
Very nice, kind and helpful. He is extremely smart and yet modest.
